GOD.content: Christianity, “seeing in secret,” God the Father restores economy interrupted by the dividing of heaven from earth
GOD.linkedContent: Christianity, “seeing in secret,” God the Father restores economy interrupted by the dividing of heaven from earth

GOD.content: 2 economies of salary: retribution (exchange), and love of foreigner, an interruption, an exceeding of the economy of the community, of Schmitt’s strict politics, interrupts self-consciousness, inaugurates exchange
GOD.linkedContent: 2 economies of salary: retribution (exchange), and love of foreigner, an interruption, an exceeding of the economy of the community, of Schmitt’s strict politics, interrupts self-consciousness, inaugurates exchange

GOD.content: God of Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, not the God of philosophers of ontotheology, but one who interrupts & retracts his order
GOD.linkedContent: God of Abraham, Isaac, Jacob, not the God of philosophers of ontotheology, but one who interrupts & retracts his order

GT.content: gift interrupts economy, it’s not impossible but the impossible
GT.linkedContent: gift interrupts economy, it’s not impossible but the impossible

GT.content: why desire to interrupt circulation of circle, why desire the gift?
GT.linkedContent: why desire to interrupt circulation of circle, why desire the gift?

GT.content: interruption opens space of absolute heterogeneity—infinite secret

R.content: messianicity that at once interrupts and accomplishes intrinsic historicity [re: concept of democracy]
R.linkedContent: messianicity that at once interrupts and accomplishes intrinsic historicity [re: concept of democracy]

FK.content: socius as the secret of testimonial experience, a certain faith, address/relation to tout autre, that is, socius as non-relationship of absolute interruption: Levinas, Blanchot
FK.linkedContent: socius as the secret of testimonial experience, a certain faith, address/relation to tout autre, that is, socius as non-relationship of absolute interruption: Levinas, Blanchot

FL.content: via Benjamin, terrifying moments of suffering, crime, torture: “mystical” epochē, moment of suspense, instance of nonlaw, founding or revolutionary violence, a pure performative act that wouldn’t have to respond to anyone, interrupts
FL.linkedContent: via Benjamin, terrifying moments of suffering, crime, torture: “mystical” epochē, moment of suspense, instance of nonlaw, founding or revolutionary violence, a pure performative act that wouldn’t have to respond to anyone, interrupts

LOBL.content: quotation interrupts very belonging to which it is a necessary condition
LOBL.linkedContent: quotation interrupts very belonging to which it is a necessary condition

LOBL.content: interruption, connectionless connection of arrêt > passes through insides w/out insides of ego of récitant
LOBL.linkedContent: interruption, connectionless connection of arrêt > passes through insides w/out insides of ego of récitant

SPOM.content: spectrality interrupts all specularity, de-synchronizes, calls us to anachrony
SPOM.linkedContent: spectrality interrupts all specularity, de-synchronizes, calls us to anachrony

SPOM.content: Marx wants to interrupt filiation to Hegel
SPOM.linkedContent: Marx wants to interrupt filiation to Hegel

SPOM.content: “lineage of patrimony [from Plato to Marx] [nominalism, conceptualism, realism, rhetoric, logic, proper meaning…] is wrought, but never interrupted” by the question of the idea, question of the concept, concept of the concept, the question of life-death, opening onto a dimension of irreducible sur-vival or surviving (survivance)
SPOM.linkedContent: “lineage of patrimony [from Plato to Marx] [nominalism, conceptualism, realism, rhetoric, logic, proper meaning…] is wrought, but never interrupted” by the question of the idea, question of the concept, concept of the concept, the question of life-death, opening onto a dimension of irreducible sur-vival or surviving (survivance)

POOF.content: Nietzsche’s upheaval (soulèvement), interruption of Aristotle’s “O my friends…”, a seismic wave, a revolution of the political (more discreet than revolutions known under the name): refuses “accepted propriety of its [“O my friends…”] paradox,” counter-testimony
POOF.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s upheaval (soulèvement), interruption of Aristotle’s “O my friends…”, a seismic wave, a revolution of the political (more discreet than revolutions known under the name): refuses “accepted propriety of its [“O my friends…”] paradox,” counter-testimony

POOF.content: suspension, imminence of interruption, the other, revolution, chaos: risk of an instability
POOF.linkedContent: suspension, imminence of interruption, the other, revolution, chaos: risk of an instability

POOF.content: Nietzsche’s silence (among friends), imperative/enigma of sense of decency (pudeur) [Why I am a Destiny]: an erasure w/out erasure, everything is possible in this silence > silence as interruption that substitutes testimony for know-how, faith for the test, the perhaps for certainty, other for same, friendship for calculation: different way of thinking among
POOF.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s silence (among friends), imperative/enigma of sense of decency (pudeur) [Why I am a Destiny]: an erasure w/out erasure, everything is possible in this silence > silence as interruption that substitutes testimony for know-how, faith for the test, the perhaps for certainty, other for same, friendship for calculation: different way of thinking among

POOF.content: event of Nietzsche, signatory & witness, cause & effect, of a few unprecedented ruptures/interruptions in place of friendship > yet, interruption/rupture not sufficient to account for where Nietzsche folds into Christianity
POOF.linkedContent: event of Nietzsche, signatory & witness, cause & effect, of a few unprecedented ruptures/interruptions in place of friendship > yet, interruption/rupture not sufficient to account for where Nietzsche folds into Christianity

VM.content: [Derrida on Levinas’ method] uses philosophy’s own light to reveal that philosophy’s surface is severely cracked (lézardes), that its solidity is its rigidity > progresses along cracks, negates negations, neither/nor, poetic force of metaphor a trace of this wounding of language
VM.linkedContent: [Derrida on Levinas’ method] uses philosophy’s own light to reveal that philosophy’s surface is severely cracked (lézardes), that its solidity is its rigidity > progresses along cracks, negates negations, neither/nor, poetic force of metaphor a trace of this wounding of language

VM.content: forever discreet, interrupting all historical totalities through its freedom of speech, face not “of this world”
VM.linkedContent: forever discreet, interrupting all historical totalities through its freedom of speech, face not “of this world”

VM.content: être derrière le signe qui est dans le monde, c’est ensuite demeurer invisible au monde dans l’épiphanie
VM.linkedContent: être derrière le signe qui est dans le monde, c’est ensuite demeurer invisible au monde dans l’épiphanie

PP.content: Plato cannot see the links (les liasons), les laisser dans l’ombre ou les y interrompre > they go on working, outside his text? thanks to him? in his text? outside his text?
PP.linkedContent: Plato cannot see the links (les liasons), les laisser dans l’ombre ou les y interrompre > they go on working, outside his text? thanks to him? in his text? outside his text?

PAS.content: Blanchot: she would have wanted to devote her final force to interruption and stifling
PAS.linkedContent: Blanchot: she would have wanted to devote her final force to interruption and stifling

PAS.content: risk of interruption is run, programmed in the night, by the récit
PAS.linkedContent: risk of interruption is run, programmed in the night, by the récit

PAS.content: from where the right to interrupt? unjustifiable violence of interruption, nothing more servile, indiscreet, unspeakable than generalizing, appropriating the unique, breaking the seal of an absolute singularity [re: citing from Friendship, on single friendship btwn Bataille & Blanchot]
PAS.linkedContent: from where the right to interrupt? unjustifiable violence of interruption, nothing more servile, indiscreet, unspeakable than generalizing, appropriating the unique, breaking the seal of an absolute singularity [re: citing from Friendship, on single friendship btwn Bataille & Blanchot]

PAS.content: Derrida always interrupts Blanchot’s citations very arbitrarily, he is interested, like Blanchot, in logic of parts and partage
PAS.linkedContent: Derrida always interrupts Blanchot’s citations very arbitrarily, he is interested, like Blanchot, in logic of parts and partage

FSW.content: most interesting analogy of Mystic Pad is time, discontinuous time, time as spacing, withdrawal of perception, periodic non-excitability > interruption/restoration of contact
FSW.linkedContent: most interesting analogy of Mystic Pad is time, discontinuous time, time as spacing, withdrawal of perception, periodic non-excitability > interruption/restoration of contact

T.content: “can one puncture the tympanum” of philosophy—its percussion (which amortizes impressions, typoi resonate)—a place of exteriority, alterity where one can still treat of philosophy?
T.linkedContent: “can one puncture the tympanum” of philosophy—its percussion (which amortizes impressions, typoi resonate)—a place of exteriority, alterity where one can still treat of philosophy?

T.content: is there any ruse which will prevent philosophy from borrowing its categories from logos of other, affecting itself w/out delay [see POOF p. 1]
T.linkedContent: is there any ruse which will prevent philosophy from borrowing its categories from logos of other, affecting itself w/out delay [see POOF p. 1]

T.content: philosophize w/ hammer, batter their ears, Dionysiansism, sound of tympani
T.linkedContent: philosophize w/ hammer, batter their ears, Dionysiansism, sound of tympani

T.content: if tympanum is a limit, unhinge concept of limit > no limit in general, every limus, the limes, short cut, the oblique
T.linkedContent: if tympanum is a limit, unhinge concept of limit > no limit in general, every limus, the limes, short cut, the oblique

PPHS.content: Hegel critiques mute writing, released from voice, thus he critiques mathematical symbolism, operations of formal understanding
PPHS.linkedContent: Hegel critiques mute writing, released from voice, thus he critiques mathematical symbolism, operations of formal understanding

PPHS.content: acc. Hegel, silence of writing, space of calculation, interrupts movement of Aufhebung, interiorization of past (Erinnerung), history of spirit
PPHS.linkedContent: acc. Hegel, silence of writing, space of calculation, interrupts movement of Aufhebung, interiorization of past (Erinnerung), history of spirit

SH.content: “caesura is the law”: gathers in the discretion of the discontinuous, in the cutting in of relation to other, interruption of address as address itself
SH.linkedContent: “caesura is the law”: gathers in the discretion of the discontinuous, in the cutting in of relation to other, interruption of address as address itself

F.content: le tiers incorporé est gardé pour être supprimé [held in to be crossed out]: assembly of witnesses around Wolf Man’s crypt (forum): whole strategy of testifying > on s’y coupe tout le temps, witnesses testify by interrupting, wounded by angular edges of forum
F.linkedContent: le tiers incorporé est gardé pour être supprimé [held in to be crossed out]: assembly of witnesses around Wolf Man’s crypt (forum): whole strategy of testifying > on s’y coupe tout le temps, witnesses testify by interrupting, wounded by angular edges of forum

FWT.content: revolution, interruption, radical caesura in ordinary course of History > revolution only event worthy of the name (all responsibility: revolutionary)
FWT.linkedContent: revolution, interruption, radical caesura in ordinary course of History > revolution only event worthy of the name (all responsibility: revolutionary)

DS.content: “fiction,” “hymen,” “spacious” are caught in, while disrupting, ontological machine

P.content: Kant’s beauty [wild tulip] requires absolute interruption: straining toward end w/out goal, not pure if cut can be bandaged (pansable), no pure cut (if it could be prolonged, completed, supplemented), no beauty > everything in it straining toward the bout (end, blow)
P.linkedContent: Kant’s beauty [wild tulip] requires absolute interruption: straining toward end w/out goal, not pure if cut can be bandaged (pansable), no pure cut (if it could be prolonged, completed, supplemented), no beauty > everything in it straining toward the bout (end, blow)

P.content: isn’t the frame exactly what Kant means by free-wandering beauty? but, unlike frame, that which is beautiful tends towards meaning, a tension, vection, rection that must be absolutely interrupted [from concept, end] to liberate beauty [not stopgap of sublime, though]
P.linkedContent: isn’t the frame exactly what Kant means by free-wandering beauty? but, unlike frame, that which is beautiful tends towards meaning, a tension, vection, rection that must be absolutely interrupted [from concept, end] to liberate beauty [not stopgap of sublime, though]

POS.content: “I do not believe” in decisive ruptures, unequivocal “epistemological break[s]”, breaks are always reinscribed in old cloth that must be undone interminably
POS.linkedContent: “I do not believe” in decisive ruptures, unequivocal “epistemological break[s]”, breaks are always reinscribed in old cloth that must be undone interminably

POS.content: if there’s a definition of differance, it’s the limit, interruption, destruction of Hegel’s relève, wherever it is
POS.linkedContent: if there’s a definition of differance, it’s the limit, interruption, destruction of Hegel’s relève, wherever it is

POS.content: if one does not develop a systematic strategy of deconstruction, textual irruptions risk falling into excess, into empirical experiments, or into classical metaphysics > but certain risks must be run [re: problematic first re: his own writing on “history of philosophy”]
POS.linkedContent: if one does not develop a systematic strategy of deconstruction, textual irruptions risk falling into excess, into empirical experiments, or into classical metaphysics > but certain risks must be run [re: problematic first re: his own writing on “history of philosophy”]

ROP.content: how can the cut be the tie itself? how can the link be the interruption?
ROP.linkedContent: how can the cut be the tie itself? how can the link be the interruption?

GSP.content: genetic description of ego prescribes task of a universal genetic phenomenology (a eidos of historicity) for Husserl, this is not a series of ruptures, revolutions, that tear open a previous finitude to lay bear a hidden infinity, giving voice to dynamis of silence > the ruptures are always already indicated [Telos] [Derrida wonders if this a metaphysical affirmation in a phenemonology]
GSP.linkedContent: genetic description of ego prescribes task of a universal genetic phenomenology (a eidos of historicity) for Husserl, this is not a series of ruptures, revolutions, that tear open a previous finitude to lay bear a hidden infinity, giving voice to dynamis of silence > the ruptures are always already indicated [Telos] [Derrida wonders if this a metaphysical affirmation in a phenemonology]

O.content: dissemination also explains itself, “the apparatus explains itself,” constitutes itself into a program (heterogeneity, absolute exteriority of seed), but one that is not formalizable, infinity of its code, sa rupture, not saturated w/ self-presence: “it is attached (tient), so to speak, to the incessant falling of a supplement to the code”
O.linkedContent: dissemination also explains itself, “the apparatus explains itself,” constitutes itself into a program (heterogeneity, absolute exteriority of seed), but one that is not formalizable, infinity of its code, sa rupture, not saturated w/ self-presence: “it is attached (tient), so to speak, to the incessant falling of a supplement to the code”

RGE.content: in doubling lordship (la maîtrise), sovereignty doesn’t remove itself from dialectics or its synthesis like an independent morsel (une pièce) > such an abstract negation would consolidate ontologics > sovereignty not simply a caesura or interruption but an opening, irruption: sovereignty inscribes dialectical synthesis, provides economy of reason w/ its unlimiting boundaries of non-sense, makes it function in sacrifice of meaning (du sens)
RGE.linkedContent: in doubling lordship (la maîtrise), sovereignty doesn’t remove itself from dialectics or its synthesis like an independent morsel (une pièce) > such an abstract negation would consolidate ontologics > sovereignty not simply a caesura or interruption but an opening, irruption: sovereignty inscribes dialectical synthesis, provides economy of reason w/ its unlimiting boundaries of non-sense, makes it function in sacrifice of meaning (du sens)

REST.content: interlacing of interruption points, a purely faked multiplicity [Derrida confessing about the multiple voices, the dialogue occurring in essay?], periods remain w/out destination, but they have authority in common [cf. ATM how do interruptions interlace?]
REST.linkedContent: interlacing of interruption points, a purely faked multiplicity [Derrida confessing about the multiple voices, the dialogue occurring in essay?], periods remain w/out destination, but they have authority in common [cf. ATM how do interruptions interlace?]

DST.content: secret: the w/out relation (sans-rapport) [compare to Lacan’s no sexual relation], the separation, the interruption
DST.linkedContent: secret: the w/out relation (sans-rapport) [compare to Lacan’s no sexual relation], the separation, the interruption

DST.content: imprint and caesura, sharp-edged signature (empreinte et césure, la signature aiguë), interrupts most powerful filiations > ineluctably: when tradition can’t secure what it repeats as its own traditionality (exemplarity, repetition, identification, imitation)
DST.linkedContent: imprint and caesura, sharp-edged signature (empreinte et césure, la signature aiguë), interrupts most powerful filiations > ineluctably: when tradition can’t secure what it repeats as its own traditionality (exemplarity, repetition, identification, imitation)

DST.content: signature interrupts, or rather marks w/ incision, the fold along which metaphysical ontomimetology is destined to divide, desist [ontomimetology in Plato, Aristotle, Hegel, Heidegger, and more surreptitiously in Nietzsche, Freud, Lacan]
DST.linkedContent: signature interrupts, or rather marks w/ incision, the fold along which metaphysical ontomimetology is destined to divide, desist [ontomimetology in Plato, Aristotle, Hegel, Heidegger, and more surreptitiously in Nietzsche, Freud, Lacan]

PF.content: [re: Peggy Kamuf’s collection] invention: 1) discovery of what appeared already to be found there 2) making exist what’s not yet there: becomes public/readable at instant of irreplaceable signature that interrupts/displaces continuity of unveiling discovery
PF.linkedContent: [re: Peggy Kamuf’s collection] invention: 1) discovery of what appeared already to be found there 2) making exist what’s not yet there: becomes public/readable at instant of irreplaceable signature that interrupts/displaces continuity of unveiling discovery

EJQB.content: God lets silence interrupt his voice and his signs, lets Tables be broken: letting us [Derrida identifying w/ Jews?] be interrogated
EJQB.linkedContent: God lets silence interrupt his voice and his signs, lets Tables be broken: letting us [Derrida identifying w/ Jews?] be interrogated

EJQB.content: God of classical philosophers had no need to write (never interrogated/interrupted himself)
EJQB.linkedContent: God of classical philosophers had no need to write (never interrogated/interrupted himself)

EJQB.content: if nature refuses the leap (saut), Scripture will never be nature: proceeds by leaps alone
EJQB.linkedContent: if nature refuses the leap (saut), Scripture will never be nature: proceeds by leaps alone

EJQB.content: to write: courage to lose one’s life, to die away from nature
EJQB.linkedContent: to write: courage to lose one’s life, to die away from nature

IW.content: coming of an event initiates irruption (volcano), rupture and hence interruption of totalizing synthesis
IW.linkedContent: coming of an event initiates irruption (volcano), rupture and hence interruption of totalizing synthesis

PJP.content: ultimate resource/fatality of the anacoluthon: multiplicity of times, instants, interruption time inscribes in “me” > the perjurer can always ask to be excused
PJP.linkedContent: ultimate resource/fatality of the anacoluthon: multiplicity of times, instants, interruption time inscribes in “me” > the perjurer can always ask to be excused

PJP.content: the suspension of metonymy, quotation, interruption, quasi anacoluthic change of subject > interruption in the obvious: shadow at heart of light
PJP.linkedContent: the suspension of metonymy, quotation, interruption, quasi anacoluthic change of subject > interruption in the obvious: shadow at heart of light

PJP.content: the “us” of the anacoluthon, not absolute knowledge, interrupts forever: no one says better, “we are not present to the truth of us” than the acolyte
PJP.linkedContent: the “us” of the anacoluthon, not absolute knowledge, interrupts forever: no one says better, “we are not present to the truth of us” than the acolyte

PJP.content: when we are present, truth’s not there; suivre/être [see ATIA]
PJP.linkedContent: when we are present, truth’s not there; suivre/être [see ATIA]

PJP.content: sacrifice of Isaac: sort of rupture w/ marriage, infidelity to Sarah [marriage as Christian madness]
PJP.linkedContent: sacrifice of Isaac: sort of rupture w/ marriage, infidelity to Sarah [marriage as Christian madness]

+R.content: rigor/joyous severity of trait, petrifying (médusante) impassivity of line > disjunction works on any equality, unhinges, interrupts, truncates > “integrity in dispersion”
+R.linkedContent: rigor/joyous severity of trait, petrifying (médusante) impassivity of line > disjunction works on any equality, unhinges, interrupts, truncates > “integrity in dispersion”

TN.content: for Nancy, [re: “extreme contraction” that turns opening into auto-affection] “I” owes as much to the contract, to gathered stroke or trait of this contraction, as to the opening itself (what’s called a mouth) > a gathering in an interruption (“syncope,” “convulsion,” “spasm”), cut that opens & shuts the mouth
TN.linkedContent: for Nancy, [re: “extreme contraction” that turns opening into auto-affection] “I” owes as much to the contract, to gathered stroke or trait of this contraction, as to the opening itself (what’s called a mouth) > a gathering in an interruption (“syncope,” “convulsion,” “spasm”), cut that opens & shuts the mouth

TN.content: acc. Nancy, laughter as philosopher’s presence to himself, contact successfully interrupted gives pleasure of syncope, pleasure of which it is depriving itself
TN.linkedContent: acc. Nancy, laughter as philosopher’s presence to himself, contact successfully interrupted gives pleasure of syncope, pleasure of which it is depriving itself

TN.content: syncope, interruption in contact, a history of never touching touch
TN.linkedContent: syncope, interruption in contact, a history of never touching touch

TN.content: interruption of auto-affection of mouth imparts speech [?]
to continually tell a story, start again, stems (tient) from impossible alliance of contact & syncope
TN.linkedContent: to continually tell a story, start again, stems (tient) from impossible alliance of contact & syncope

TN.content: for Husserl, fingers that touch (not signal, not show) deem contact the experience of presence, which is full, immediate, direct (Nancy’s syncope interrupts)
TN.linkedContent: for Husserl, fingers that touch (not signal, not show) deem contact the experience of presence, which is full, immediate, direct (Nancy’s syncope interrupts)

TN.content: this other heart that self touches you, gives pleasure where pleasure’s made more intense by not returning to me, diastole w/out systole > the ecstatic & haptical sans of “sans revenir à soi”
TN.linkedContent: this other heart that self touches you, gives pleasure where pleasure’s made more intense by not returning to me, diastole w/out systole > the ecstatic & haptical sans of “sans revenir à soi”

TN.content: you beat the heart, you interrupt circulation
TN.linkedContent: you beat the heart, you interrupt circulation

ATM.content: [vis-à-vis Levinas] interdictory language is interdicted but continues speaking, can’t help itself, can only continue strangely interrupting itself > essential function of a quotation: quoting the uncitable accuses language, (sur)rendered to a gift language can’t open up on its own
ATM.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Levinas] interdictory language is interdicted but continues speaking, can’t help itself, can only continue strangely interrupting itself > essential function of a quotation: quoting the uncitable accuses language, (sur)rendered to a gift language can’t open up on its own

ATM.content: Levinas negotiates his negotiation w/ the unnegotiable in a way where he negotiates the negotiation (he reties the thread, weaves his interruptions of the same), to give the other a chance [Derrida refers to a double negation here], reprend dans sa toile l’histoire de toutes ses ruptures
ATM.linkedContent: Levinas negotiates his negotiation w/ the unnegotiable in a way where he negotiates the negotiation (he reties the thread, weaves his interruptions of the same), to give the other a chance [Derrida refers to a double negation here], reprend dans sa toile l’histoire de toutes ses ruptures

ATM.content: interruptive breakthrough occurs, ineluctable au moment même when Levinas’ philosophical récit claims to reappropriate the tear (déchirure) w/in the continuum of its (sa) texture
ATM.linkedContent: interruptive breakthrough occurs, ineluctable au moment même when Levinas’ philosophical récit claims to reappropriate the tear (déchirure) w/in the continuum of its (sa) texture

ATM.content: Levinas’ “en ce moment même” [of reappropriation] obligated by the second “en ce moment même” [of interruption] > forms a text w/ its own tear (déchirure), this “series” does not enclose the Other but opens itself up from out of irreducible difference—before any present moment
ATM.linkedContent: Levinas’ “en ce moment même” [of reappropriation] obligated by the second “en ce moment même” [of interruption] > forms a text w/ its own tear (déchirure), this “series” does not enclose the Other but opens itself up from out of irreducible difference—before any present moment

ATM.content: no tear (déchirure) possible in Levinas’ text w/out a certain notching (échancrure) of the 2nd moment, and certain contamination btwn the 2 > he likes the tear he detests contamination
ATM.linkedContent: no tear (déchirure) possible in Levinas’ text w/out a certain notching (échancrure) of the 2nd moment, and certain contamination btwn the 2 > he likes the tear he detests contamination

ATM.content: for Levinas, interruption puts an end to the authority of the Said, the thematical, dialectical, the same, the economical
ATM.linkedContent: for Levinas, interruption puts an end to the authority of the Said, the thematical, dialectical, the same, the economical

ATM.content: Levinas describes how the enveloping continuum or tissue of the State, the dialectic, etc., preserves itself by cutting out interruptions and retying/maintaining itself in suppressing them: Levinas reties cut threads (not continuous ones): this is the trace of his diachrony, trace of discontinuity
ATM.linkedContent: Levinas describes how the enveloping continuum or tissue of the State, the dialectic, etc., preserves itself by cutting out interruptions and retying/maintaining itself in suppressing them: Levinas reties cut threads (not continuous ones): this is the trace of his diachrony, trace of discontinuity

ATM.content: if the State leaves a trace of interruptions too, how does Levinas’ tracing of them differ? it ties together interruptions btwn threads [i.e. doesn’t tie threads], a series out of series (hors-série) > series: hiatus must insist
ATM.linkedContent: if the State leaves a trace of interruptions too, how does Levinas’ tracing of them differ? it ties together interruptions btwn threads [i.e. doesn’t tie threads], a series out of series (hors-série) > series: hiatus must insist

ATM.content: Levinas obligates w/out constraint, by way of nonphenomenality, to read the trace as trace, interruption as interruption (i.e. acc. as such no longer reappropriable as phenomenon of essence)
ATM.linkedContent: Levinas obligates w/out constraint, by way of nonphenomenality, to read the trace as trace, interruption as interruption (i.e. acc. as such no longer reappropriable as phenomenon of essence)

ATM.content: since interruption is not a cut but logic of ab-solute de-stricturation, since it is reappropriable: to insist on the hiatus, the series is necessary > series has no single knot, but knots a multiplicity of retied knots (noeuds re-noués)
ATM.linkedContent: since interruption is not a cut but logic of ab-solute de-stricturation, since it is reappropriable: to insist on the hiatus, the series is necessary > series has no single knot, but knots a multiplicity of retied knots (noeuds re-noués)

ATM.content: opening of interruption is never pure
[Derrida wonders about the risk of Levinas’ obligated negotiation, what he calls an inevitable “concession”: to stricture interruptions, contaminate, interrupt them]
ATM.linkedContent: [Derrida wonders about the risk of Levinas’ obligated negotiation, what he calls an inevitable “concession”: to stricture interruptions, contaminate, interrupt them]

ATM.content: for Levinas, in search of God uncontaminated by Being, contact is a priori contamination > graver yet: risk of contamination that surfaces before contact, in necessity of tying interruptions together (insistence of ruptures)
ATM.linkedContent: for Levinas, in search of God uncontaminated by Being, contact is a priori contamination > graver yet: risk of contamination that surfaces before contact, in necessity of tying interruptions together (insistence of ruptures)

ATM.content: no edges in this interruptive series, in this incomparable stricture, but tapering points (establishing continuity at a distance [?]) > binding & unbinding, the lace (lacet) of obligation is in place (not a trap): an ob-ligation that un-binds, opens up religion in this very unbinding
ATM.linkedContent: no edges in this interruptive series, in this incomparable stricture, but tapering points (establishing continuity at a distance [?]) > binding & unbinding, the lace (lacet) of obligation is in place (not a trap): an ob-ligation that un-binds, opens up religion in this very unbinding

ATM.content: interruptions unbound “together,” in the “same” sériature, in dia-synchrony, a serial one time of “several times” that took place only once
ATM.linkedContent: interruptions unbound “together,” in the “same” sériature, in dia-synchrony, a serial one time of “several times” that took place only once

ATM.content: for Levinas, to make passage to other, there can’t be an absolute erasure, withdrawal must appear, “He,” only there in seriasure, a series of hiatuses (mouth agape), enlaced erasures
ATM.linkedContent: for Levinas, to make passage to other, there can’t be an absolute erasure, withdrawal must appear, “He,” only there in seriasure, a series of hiatuses (mouth agape), enlaced erasures

ATM.content: the retrait Levinas re-marks is not unique, though it remarks the unique, its seriasure is unique > not his signature but his seriasure
ATM.linkedContent: the retrait Levinas re-marks is not unique, though it remarks the unique, its seriasure is unique > not his signature but his seriasure

ATM.content: “je donne, je joue l’ingratitude contre jalousie,” if God is exempt from jealousy (no desire for possession) must he not guard this exemption jealously, and in so doing lose himself? > ellipse de jalousie: le sans-jalousie se garde jalousement, autrement dit se perd, se-garde-se-perd: plus de jalousie [seriasure always a jealous, series of traits & retraits, beyond the face]
ATM.linkedContent: “je donne, je joue l’ingratitude contre jalousie,” if God is exempt from jealousy (no desire for possession) must he not guard this exemption jealously, and in so doing lose himself? > ellipse de jalousie: le sans-jalousie se garde jalousement, autrement dit se perd, se-garde-se-perd: plus de jalousie [seriasure always a jealous, series of traits & retraits, beyond the face]

AD.content: if relation to other is an infinite separation, death comes to hollow out (creuser) even more infinitely this separation: interruption déchirante (rending) au coeur de l’interruption même?
AD.linkedContent: if relation to other is an infinite separation, death comes to hollow out (creuser) even more infinitely this separation: interruption déchirante (rending) au coeur de l’interruption même?

AD.content: interruption se produit, se décide—in name of ethics
hiatus ensures that analysis encounters dissociation in structure of arguments, heterogeneity: text knows how to interrupt itself

AD.content: law of substitution, from substitution as law: the 3rd interrupts (distances) w/out interrupting (distancing)
